system.description:
When you select this archetype at 3rd level, you have developed the unique psionic ability to render your emotions, particularly your fury, contagious, and to project them onto others. 

Whenever you gain rage hit points, you can use your reaction to project your rage at another creature within 20 feet.  They either gain temporary hit points equal the number of rage hit points you just gained, or take psychic damage equal to that amount. 

At 6th level the range of this ability increases to 30 feet, at 10th level it increases to 40ft, and at 14th level it increases to 50ft.
